snippet: On Nov. 26, an “unauthorized third party” gained access to names, dates of birth and lab results, but not insurance or financial information, the company said....
abstract: New Jersey-based medical laboratory company Quest Diagnostics says it is investigating hack that exposed personal health information of about 34,000 people.
lead_paragraph: On Nov. 26, an “unauthorized third party” gained access to names, dates of birth and lab results, but not insurance or financial information, the company said.

headline.main: Hack of Quest Diagnostics App Exposes Data of 34,000 Patients
